NFTs List (ID Map)
GET
https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/nfts/list

This endpoint allows you to query all supported NFTs with ID, contract address, name, asset platform ID and symbol on CoinGecko

üëç

Tips

You may use this endpoint to query the list of nfts for other endpoints that contain params like id (NFT collection‚Äôs ID) as well as asset_platform_id and contract_address.
You may include values such as per_page and page to specify how many results you would like to show in the responses per page and which page of responses you would like to show.
üìò

Notes

The responses are paginated to 100 items.
Cache / Update Frequency: every 5 minutes for all the API plans.
QUERY PARAMS
order
string

use this to sort the order of responses

h24_volume_usd_asc
h24_volume_usd_desc
h24_volume_native_asc
h24_volume_native_desc
floor_price_native_asc
floor_price_native_desc
market_cap_native_asc
market_cap_native_desc
market_cap_usd_asc
market_cap_usd_desc
per_page
number

total results per page
Valid values: 1...250

page
number

page through results

RESPONSE
200

List all NFTs categories

RESPONSE BODY
object
id
string

NFT collection ID

contract_address
string

NFT collection contract address

name
string

NFT collection name

asset_platform_id
string

NFT collection asset platform ID

symbol
string

NFT collection symbol

Updated about 1 month ago

Derivatives Exchanges List (ID Map)
NFTs Collection Data by ID
Did this page help you?
Yes
No
LANGUAGE
Shell
Node
Ruby
PHP
Python
CREDENTIALS
Header
Log in to use your API keys
CURL REQUEST
1
curl --request GET \
2
     --url https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/nfts/list \
3
     --header 'accept: application/json'
Try It!
RESPONSE
200
EXAMPLE
1
[
2
  {
3
    "id": "bored-ape-yacht-club",
4
    "contract_address": "0xbc4ca0eda7647a8ab7c2061c2e118a18a936f13d",
5
    "name": "Bored Ape Yacht Club",
6
    "asset_platform_id": "ethereum",
7
    "symbol": "BAYC"
8
  },
9
  {
10
    "id": "pudgy-penguins",
11
    "contract_address": "0xBd3531dA5CF5857e7CfAA92426877b022e612cf8",
12
    "name": "Pudgy Penguins",
13
    "asset_platform_id": "ethereum",
14
    "symbol": "PPG"
15

16
